answers.answer: Did you ever find a cure for your excess saliva problem. I have the same problem  and it's upsetting to me as I see everyone wiping off their face when I talk to them.  I have had this problem for the last 10 years.  please help.  I do have type 2 diabetes and b vitamin deficiency.

question: What could possibly be causing a small amount of salivia "spit" to come out of my mouth while talking? This just started to occur a few months ago. It is not visible, but people I speak to can feel it and I can as well when I am talking.  I am 33 years old and have never experienced and issue such as this.
title: Spit while talking
